2023.title: PostgreSQL 15 Performance Gains
2023.description: PostgreSQL 15 brought significant improvements in query performance, particularly with parallel query execution, improved UNIQUE and PRIMARY KEY index creation, and enhanced logical replication.

2023.title: MongoDB 7.0 Atlas Search
2023.description: MongoDB enhanced Atlas Search with vector search capabilities and improved text analysis, making it easier to build AI-powered search experiences and semantic search applications.

2023.title: Redis Stack and Vector Similarity
2023.description: Redis introduced vector similarity search capabilities through RediSearch 2.6, enabling AI-powered search and recommendations directly within Redis, plus enhanced JSON support.

2023.title: Neo4j 5.0 for Graph Analytics
2023.description: Neo4j 5.0 delivered major performance improvements for graph analytics and pattern matching, with new indexing capabilities and Cypher language enhancements.

2023.title: Vector Databases Emerge
2023.description: 2023 saw the rise of specialized vector databases like Pinecone, Weaviate, and Milvus, optimized for AI embeddings and similarity search as AI applications became mainstream.

2023.title: MySQL 8.0 HeatWave ML
2023.description: MySQL HeatWave introduced machine learning capabilities, allowing in-database ML training and inference while maintaining ACID properties and SQL compatibility.

2023.title: CockroachDB 23.1
2023.description: CockroachDB 23.1 released with improved spatial data support, enhanced JSON capabilities, and better compatibility with PostgreSQL ecosystem tools.

2023.title: Time-Series DB Evolution
2023.description: TimescaleDB and InfluxDB enhanced their platforms with better compression, query performance, and ML integration features for IoT and observability use cases.

2023.title: Supabase Database Platform
2023.description: Supabase gained popularity as an open-source Firebase alternative, offering PostgreSQL backend with real-time capabilities and enhanced developer experience.
